Spawn offline players in online mode if online-mode player with specified name does not exist
carpet.rule.antiCheatDisabled.name: antiCheatDisabled
carpet.rule.antiCheatDisabled.desc: Prevents players from rubberbanding when moving too fast
carpet.rule.antiCheatDisabled.extra.1: Puts more trust in clients positioning
carpet.rule.antiCheatDisabled.extra.2: Increases player allowed mining distance to 32 blocks
carpet.rule.carpetCommandPermissionLevel: Carpet command permission level. Can only be set via .conf file
carpet.rule.carpets.name: carpets
carpet.rule.carpets.desc: Placing carpets may issue carpet commands for non-op players
carpet.rule.chainStone.name: chainStone
carpet.rule.chainStone.desc: Chains will stick to each other on the long ends
carpet.rule.chainStone.extra.0: and will stick to other blocks that connect to them directly.
carpet.rule.chainStone.extra.1: With stick_to_all: it will stick even if not visually connected
carpet.rule.cleanLogs.name: cleanLogs
carpet.rule.cleanLogs.desc: Removes abnoxious messages from the logs
carpet.rule.cleanLogs.extra.0: Doesn't display 'Maximum sound pool size 247 reached'
carpet.rule.cleanLogs.extra.1: Which is normal with decent farms and contraptions
carpet.rule.commandDistance.name: commandDistance
carpet.rule.commandDistance.desc: Enables /distance command to measure in game distance between points
carpet.rule.commandDistance.extra.0: Also enables brown carpet placement action if 'carpets' rule is turned on as well
carpet.rule.commandDraw.name: commandDraw
carpet.rule.commandDraw.extra.0: ... allows for drawing simple shapes or
carpet.rule.commandDraw.extra.1: other shapes which are sorta difficult to do normally
carpet.rule.commandInfo.name: commandInfo
carpet.rule.commandInfo.extra.0: Also enables gray carpet placement action
carpet.rule.commandInfo.extra.1: if 'carpets' rule is turned on as well
carpet.rule.commandLog.name: commandLog
carpet.rule.commandLog.desc: Enables /log command to monitor events via chat and overlays
carpet.rule.commandPerimeterInfo.name: commandPerimeterInfo
carpet.rule.commandPerimeterInfo.extra.0: ... that scans the area around the block for potential spawnable spots
carpet.rule.commandPlayer.name: commandPlayer
carpet.rule.commandProfile.name: commandProfile
carpet.rule.commandProfile.desc: Enables /profile command to monitor game performance
carpet.rule.commandScript.name: commandScript
carpet.rule.commandScript.extra.0: An in-game scripting API for Scarpet programming language
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.name: commandScriptACE
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.desc: Enables restrictions for arbitrary code execution with scarpet
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.extra.0: Users that don't have this permission level
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.extra.1: won't be able to load apps or /script run.
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.extra.2: It is also the permission level apps will
carpet.rule.commandScriptACE.extra.3: have when running commands with run()
carpet.rule.commandSpawn.name: commandSpawn
carpet.rule.commandTick.name: commandTick
carpet.rule.commandTick.desc: Enables /tick command to control game clocks
carpet.rule.commandTrackAI.name: commandTrackAI
carpet.rule.commandTrackAI.desc: Allows to track mobs AI via /track command
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.name: creativeFlyDrag
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.0: Increased drag will slow down your flight
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.1: So need to adjust speed accordingly
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.2: With 1.0 drag, using speed of 11 seems to matching vanilla speeds.
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.3: Purely client side setting, meaning that
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.4: having it set on the decicated server has no effect
carpet.rule.creativeFlyDrag.extra.5: but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
carpet.rule.creativeFlySpeed.name: creativeFlySpeed
carpet.rule.creativeFlySpeed.extra.0: Purely client side setting, meaning that
carpet.rule.creativeFlySpeed.extra.1: having it set on the decicated server has no effect
carpet.rule.creativeFlySpeed.extra.2: but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.name: creativeNoClip
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.0: On servers it needs to be set on both
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.1: client and server to function properly.
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.2: Has no effect when set on the server only
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.3: Can allow to phase through walls
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.4: if only set on the carpet client side
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.5: but requires some trapdoor magic to
carpet.rule.creativeNoClip.extra.6: allow the player to enter blocks
carpet.rule.creativePlayersLoadChunks.de: Creative players load chunks, or they don't! Just like spectators!
carpet.rule.creativePlayersLoadChunks.ex: Toggling behaves exactly as if the player is in spectator mode and toggling the gamerule spectatorsGenerateChunks.
carpet.rule.ctrlQCraftingFix.name: ctrlQCraftingFix
carpet.rule.ctrlQCraftingFix.desc: Dropping entire stacks works also from on the crafting UI result slot
carpet.rule.customMOTD.name: customMOTD
carpet.rule.customMOTD.desc: Sets a different motd message on client trying to connect to the server
carpet.rule.customMOTD.extra.0: use '_' to use the startup setting from server.properties
carpet.rule.defaultLoggers.name: defaultLoggers
carpet.rule.defaultLoggers.desc: sets these loggers in their default configurations for all new players
carpet.rule.defaultLoggers.extra.0: use csv, like 'tps,mobcaps' for multiple loggers, none for nothing
carpet.rule.desertShrubs.name: desertShrubs
carpet.rule.desertShrubs.desc: Saplings turn into dead shrubs in hot climates and no water access
carpet.rule.explosionNoBlockDamage.name: explosionNoBlockDamage
carpet.rule.extremeBehaviours.name: extremeBehaviours
carpet.rule.extremeBehaviours.desc: Edge cases are as frequent as common cases, for testing only!!
carpet.rule.extremeBehaviours.extra.0: Velocities of items from dispensers, blaze projectiles, fireworks
carpet.rule.extremeBehaviours.extra.1: Directions of fireballs, wither skulls, fishing bobbers,
carpet.rule.extremeBehaviours.extra.2: items dropped from blocks and inventories, llamas spit, triggered trap horses
carpet.rule.fastRedstoneDust.name: fastRedstoneDust
carpet.rule.fastRedstoneDust.extra.1: .. also fixes some locational behaviours or vanilla redstone MC-11193
carpet.rule.fastRedstoneDust.extra.2: so behaviour of locational vanilla contraptions is not guaranteed
carpet.rule.fillLimit.name: fillLimit
carpet.rule.fillUpdates.name: fillUpdates
carpet.rule.fillUpdates.desc: fill/clone/setblock and structure blocks cause block updates
carpet.rule.flatWorldStructureSpawning.d: Allows structure mobs to spawn in flat worlds
carpet.rule.flippinCactus.name: flippinCactus
carpet.rule.flippinCactus.desc: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding cactus
carpet.rule.flippinCactus.extra.0: Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped
carpet.rule.flippinCactus.extra.1: Applies to pistons, observers, droppers, repeaters, stairs, glazed terracotta etc...
carpet.rule.fogOff.name: fogOff
carpet.rule.fogOff.desc: Removes fog from client in the nether and the end
carpet.rule.forceloadLimit.name: forceloadLimit
carpet.rule.hardcodeTNTangle.name: hardcodeTNTangle
carpet.rule.hardcodeTNTangle.desc: Sets the horizontal random angle on TNT for debugging of TNT contraptions
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.name: hopperCounters
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.desc: hoppers pointing to wool will count items passing through them
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.extra.0: Enables /counter command, and actions while placing red and green carpets on wool blocks
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.extra.1: Use /counter <color?> reset to reset the counter, and /counter <color?> to query
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.extra.2: In survival, place green carpet on same color wool to query, red to reset the counters
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.extra.3: Counters are global and shared between players, 16 channels available
carpet.rule.hopperCounters.extra.4: Items counted are destroyed, count up to one stack per tick per hopper
carpet.rule.huskSpawningInTemples.name: huskSpawningInTemples
carpet.rule.huskSpawningInTemples.desc: Only husks spawn in desert temples
carpet.rule.interactionUpdates.name: interactionUpdates
carpet.rule.lagFreeSpawning.name: lagFreeSpawning
carpet.rule.lagFreeSpawning.desc: Spawning requires much less CPU and Memory
carpet.rule.language.name: language
carpet.rule.leadFix.name: leadFix
carpet.rule.leadFix.desc: Fixes leads breaking/becoming invisible in unloaded chunks
carpet.rule.leadFix.extra.0: You may still get visibly broken leash links on the client side, but server side the link is still there.
carpet.rule.lightEngineMaxBatchSize.name: lightEngineMaxBatchSize
carpet.rule.lightEngineMaxBatchSize.desc: Changes maximum light tasks batch size
carpet.rule.lightEngineMaxBatchSize.extr: Allows for a higher light suppression tolerance
setting it to 5 - Default limit defined by the game
carpet.rule.lightningKillsDropsFix.name: lightningKillsDropsFix
carpet.rule.lightningKillsDropsFix.desc: Lightning kills the items that drop when lightning kills an entity
carpet.rule.lightningKillsDropsFix.extra: Setting to true will prevent lightning from killing drops
carpet.rule.liquidDamageDisabled.name: liquidDamageDisabled
carpet.rule.liquidDamageDisabled.desc: Disables breaking of blocks caused by flowing liquids
carpet.rule.maxEntityCollisions.name: maxEntityCollisions
carpet.rule.maxEntityCollisions.desc: Customizable maximal entity collision limits, 0 for no limits
carpet.rule.mergeTNT.name: mergeTNT
carpet.rule.missingTools.name: missingTools
carpet.rule.missingTools.desc: Glass can be broken faster with pickaxes
carpet.rule.movableAmethyst.name: movableAmethyst
carpet.rule.movableAmethyst.desc: Allows Budding Amethyst blocks to be moved
carpet.rule.movableAmethyst.extra.0: Allow for them to be moved by pistons
carpet.rule.movableAmethyst.extra.1: as well as adds extra drop when mining with silk touch pickaxe
carpet.rule.movableBlockEntities.name: movableBlockEntities
carpet.rule.movableBlockEntities.desc: Pistons can push block entities, like hoppers, chests etc.
carpet.rule.optimizedTNT.name: optimizedTNT
carpet.rule.optimizedTNT.desc: TNT causes less lag when exploding in the same spot and in liquids
carpet.rule.perfPermissionLevel.name: perfPermissionLevel
carpet.rule.persistentParrots.name: persistentParrots
carpet.rule.persistentParrots.desc: Parrots don't get of your shoulders until you receive proper damage
carpet.rule.piglinsSpawningInBastions.de: Piglins will respawn in bastion remnants
carpet.rule.piglinsSpawningInBastions.ex: Includes piglins, brutes, and a few hoglins
carpet.rule.pingPlayerListLimit.name: pingPlayerListLimit
carpet.rule.pingPlayerListLimit.desc: Customizable server list ping (Multiplayer menu) playerlist sample limit
carpet.rule.placementRotationFix.name: placementRotationFix
carpet.rule.placementRotationFix.desc: fixes block placement rotation issue when player rotates quickly while placing blocks
carpet.rule.portalCreativeDelay.name: portalCreativeDelay
carpet.rule.portalCreativeDelay.desc: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in creative
carpet.rule.portalSurvivalDelay.name: portalSurvivalDelay
carpet.rule.portalSurvivalDelay.desc: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in survival
carpet.rule.pushLimit.name: pushLimit
carpet.rule.quasiConnectivity.name: quasiConnectivity
carpet.rule.quasiConnectivity.desc: Pistons, droppers and dispensers react if block above them is powered
carpet.rule.railPowerLimit.name: railPowerLimit
carpet.rule.renewableBlackstone.name: renewableBlackstone
carpet.rule.renewableBlackstone.desc: Nether basalt generator without soul sand below
carpet.rule.renewableCoral.name: renewableCoral
carpet.rule.renewableCoral.desc: Coral structures will grow with bonemeal from coral plants
carpet.rule.renewableCoral.extra.0: Expanded also allows growing from coral fans for sustainable farming outside of warm oceans
carpet.rule.renewableDeepslate.name: renewableDeepslate
carpet.rule.renewableDeepslate.desc: Lava and water generate deepslate and cobbled deepslate instead below Y16
carpet.rule.renewableDeepslate.extra.0: This rule may change Y value to 0 with 1.18
carpet.rule.renewableSponges.name: renewableSponges
carpet.rule.renewableSponges.desc: Guardians turn into Elder Guardian when struck by lightning
carpet.rule.rotatorBlock.name: rotatorBlock
carpet.rule.scriptsAppStore.name: scriptsAppStore
carpet.rule.scriptsAppStore.desc: Location of the online repository of scarpet apps
carpet.rule.scriptsAppStore.extra.1: Point to any github repo with scarpet apps
carpet.rule.scriptsAutoload.name: scriptsAutoload
carpet.rule.scriptsAutoload.desc: Scarpet script from world files will autoload on server/world start
carpet.rule.scriptsDebugging.name: scriptsDebugging
carpet.rule.scriptsDebugging.desc: Enables scripts debugging messages in system log
carpet.rule.scriptsOptimization.name: scriptsOptimization
carpet.rule.shulkerSpawningInEndCities.d: Shulkers will respawn in end cities
carpet.rule.silverFishDropGravel.name: silverFishDropGravel
carpet.rule.silverFishDropGravel.desc: Silverfish drop a gravel item when breaking out of a block
carpet.rule.simulationDistance.name: simulationDistance
carpet.rule.simulationDistance.desc: Changes the simulation distance of the server.
carpet.rule.simulationDistance.extra.0: Set to 0 to not override the value in server settings.
carpet.rule.smoothClientAnimations.name: smoothClientAnimations
carpet.rule.smoothClientAnimations.desc: smooth client animations with low tps settings
carpet.rule.smoothClientAnimations.extra: works only in SP, and will slow down players
carpet.rule.spawnChunksSize.name: spawnChunksSize
carpet.rule.spawnChunksSize.extra.1: setting it to 0 - disables spawn chunks
carpet.rule.stackableShulkerBoxes.name: stackableShulkerBoxes
carpet.rule.stackableShulkerBoxes.desc: Empty shulker boxes can stack when thrown on the ground.
.. or when manipulated inside the inventories
carpet.rule.structureBlockIgnored.name: structureBlockIgnored
carpet.rule.structureBlockIgnored.desc: Changes the block ignored by the Structure Block
carpet.rule.structureBlockLimit.name: structureBlockLimit
carpet.rule.structureBlockLimit.desc: Customizable structure block limit of each axis
carpet.rule.structureBlockLimit.extra.0: WARNING: Needs to be permanent for correct loading.
carpet.rule.structureBlockLimit.extra.3: Required on client of player editing the Structure Block.
carpet.rule.structureBlockOutlineDistanc: Customizable Structure Block outline render distance
Required on client to work properly
carpet.rule.summonNaturalLightning.name: summonNaturalLightning
carpet.rule.summonNaturalLightning.desc: summoning a lightning bolt has all the side effects of natural lightning
carpet.rule.superSecretSetting.name: superSecretSetting
carpet.rule.tntDoNotUpdate.name: tntDoNotUpdate
carpet.rule.tntDoNotUpdate.desc: TNT doesn't update when placed against a power source
carpet.rule.tntPrimerMomentumRemoved.des: Removes random TNT momentum when primed
carpet.rule.tntRandomRange.name: tntRandomRange
carpet.rule.tntRandomRange.desc: Sets the tnt random explosion range to a fixed value
carpet.rule.updateSuppressionBlock.desc: Placing an activator rail on top of a barrier block will update suppress when the rail turns off.
carpet.rule.updateSuppressionBlock.extra: Entering an integer will make the update suppression block auto-reset
Integer entered is the delay in ticks for it to reset
carpet.rule.updateSuppressionBlock.name: updateSuppressionBlock
carpet.rule.updateSuppressionCrashFix.de: Fixes update suppression causing server crashes.
carpet.rule.viewDistance.name: viewDistance
carpet.rule.viewDistance.desc: Changes the view distance of the server.
carpet.rule.viewDistance.extra.0: Set to 0 to not override the value in server settings.
carpet.rule.xpNoCooldown.name: xpNoCooldown
carpet.rule.xpNoCooldown.desc: Players absorb XP instantly, without delay
carpet.validator._client.desc: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect
Valid options for command type rules is 'true' or 'false'
Optionally you can choose 'ops' to only allow operators
or provide a custom required permission level
carpet.validator._command_level.desc: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level
carpet.validator._scarpet.desc: It controls an accompanying Scarpet App
carpet.validator.wip.message: %1$s is missing a few bits - we are still working on it.
carpet.validator.wip.desc: A few bits still needs implementing - we are working on it
carpet.validator.CarpetPermissionLevel.d: This setting can only be set by admins with op level 4
carpet.validator.ChangeSpawnChunks.messa: spawn chunk size has to be between 0 and 32
carpet.validator.FillLimitLimits.desc: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M
carpet.validator.ModulePermissionLevel.d: When changing the rule, you must at least have the permission level you are trying to give it
carpet.validator.OneHourMaxDelay.desc: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000
carpet.validator.PushLimitLimits.desc: You must choose a value from 1 to 1024
carpet.validator.ScarpetAppStore.desc: Appstore link should point to a valid github repository
carpet.validator.SimulationDistance.rang: simulation distance has to be between 0 and 32
carpet.validator.SimulationDistance.serv: simulation distance can only be changed on a server
carpet.validator.SimulationDistance.desc: You must choose a value from 0 (use server settings) to 32
carpet.validator.StackableShulkerBox.des: Value must either be true, false, or a number between 2-64
carpet.validator.StructureBlockLimit.des: You have to choose a value greater or equal to 48
carpet.validator.updateSuppressionBlockM: Cannot be negative, can be true, false, or # > 0
carpet.validator.ViewDistance.range_hint: view distance has to be between 0 and 32
carpet.validator.ViewDistance.server_onl: view distance can only be changed on a server
carpet.validator.ViewDistance.desc: You must choose a value from 0 (use server settings) to 32
carpet.command.carpet.click_to_save_the_: Click to keep the settings in %1$s to save across restarts
carpet.command.carpet.remove_default: Rule %1$s will now not be set on restart
carpet.command.counter.no_item_at_all: No items have been counted yet.
carpet.command.distance.no_start: There was no initial point for %1$s
carpet.command.perimeterinfo.not_mob_ent: /perimeterinfo requires a mob entity to test agains.
carpet.command.perimeterinfo.result.head: Spawning spaces around %1$s:
carpet.command.player.not_enough_permiss: Non OP players can't control other real players
carpet.command.player.cannot_remove: Only fake players can be moved or killed
carpet.command.player.invalid_profile:
Player %1$s is either banned by Mojang, or auth servers are down.
Banned players can only be summoned in Singleplayer and in servers in off-line mode.
carpet.command.player.banned: Player %1$s is banned on this server
carpet.command.player.whitelist_protecti: Whitelisted players can only be spawned by operators
carpet.command.player.spawn_outside_worl: Player %1$s cannot be placed outside of the world
carpet.command.player.player_not_existed: Player %1$s doesn't exist and cannot spawn in online mode. Turn the server offline to spawn non-existing players
carpet.command.spawn.mocking_started: Mob spawns will now be mocked.
carpet.command.spawn.spawn_rate_reset: Spawn rates brought to 1 round per tick for all groups.
carpet.command.spawn.spawn_rate_set: %1$s mobs will now spawn %2$s times per tick
carpet.command.spawn.mobcap_set: Mobcaps for hostile mobs changed to %1$s, other groups will follow
carpet.command.spawn.print_entities.head: Loaded entities for %1$s class:
carpet.command.spawn.tracking.disabled: Spawn tracking disabled, type '%1$s' to enable
carpet.command.spawn.report.max_y: Maximum spawn Y value for (%1$s, %2$s) is %3$s. You are %4$s.
carpet.command.tick.report.the_rest: The Rest, whatever that might be: %1$sms
carpet.command.tick.warp.already_warping: %1$s is already advancing time at the moment. Try later or ask them
carpet.command.tick.warp.finished: ... Time warp completed with %1$s tps, or %2$s mspt
